about_the_game:
Due to the high-contrast between the "two worlds" of the game, switching between them quickly may trigger photosensitive epilepsy. Please exercise caution.

Test the waters of Kenoma: Action Without Action in this app. The beginning of the game is offered here free of charge. Solve puzzles, talk to skeletons, pick up ants, all to enter a strange temple in a cave. What lies inside? Only the full game can answer this.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features semi-realistic depictions of human viscera and descriptions of such. The main character can be killed in several cartoonish ways.

detailed_description:
Due to the high-contrast between the "two worlds" of the game, switching between them quickly may trigger photosensitive epilepsy. Please exercise caution.

Test the waters of Kenoma: Action Without Action in this app. The beginning of the game is offered here free of charge. Solve puzzles, talk to skeletons, pick up ants, all to enter a strange temple in a cave. What lies inside? Only the full game can answer this.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 90 MB available space

name: Kenoma: Action Without Action [Demo]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
